title: Instant Shoyu Ramen Hack from one of Japan's BEST Ramen Chefs (Iida-san Recipe)
description:
Follow me on instagram: https://instagram.com/wayoframen
Support the Channel: https://patreon.com/wayoframen
Way of Ramen Shop: https://wayoframen.com/shop
Way of Ramen Podcast: https://anchor.fm/wayoframen

Iida Shouten is considered by many in Japan as the best shoyu ramen shop in the country. Iida-san passion for ramen was inspired by the ramen demon, Sano-san and today he carries on his legacy of ultra-refined ramen. When I asked my buddies Abram (Ramen Beast) and Brian (Ramen Adventures) where I should go to eat the best shoyu ramen, they immediately said Iida Shouten, and coming from those guys who eat ramen professionally, that is saying a lot.

Iida-san recently did a segment for a popular Japanese documentary TV show called Jounetsu Tairiku where he demonstrated how to turn instant ramen into a more authentic bowl of shoyu ramen. Being that he is famous for his shoyu ramen, I had to try it out.

Iida Shouten: https://r.iidashouten.com/
Original Video:ã€€https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rIOBbWOG9NI
